about.title: About Me
about.Description: Here are few things of what you might wanna know about me:

HomePage.name: Imane MELIANE
HomePage.description: A passionate and dedicated BTS DSI graduate from Centre BTS, driven by software development and problem-solving. I enjoy creating smart, user-friendly solutions and constantly seek to grow through meaningful projects, whether solo or in a team.

ContactPage.title: Let's work together
ContactPage.description: I'm open to collaboration, feedback, or professional opportunities. Feel free to get in touch.

work.pageDescription: Showcase of my technical expertise across various technologies and platforms

projects.title: Construction Permit Management
projects.description: During my internship at Ouled Mrah Municipality, I developed a web app to digitize construction permits and automate tax calculations. This replaced paper workflows, reducing delays and errors while improving transparency.

projects.title: Orders & Delivery
projects.description: At Nova Maroc, I developed an order/delivery tracking app that digitized manual processes, reducing errors and speeding up operations by 40%. The system featured real-time updates and automated reports. I trained staff and collaborated with teams to ensure smooth adoption.

projects.title: Library
projects.description: With 2 classmates, I developed 'Library' — a management system for cataloging books, tracking loans, and managing members. Delivered a working prototype in 3 weeks using HTML, CSS Bootstrap, JavaScript jQuery, PHP, and MySQL.

projects.title: CliqRDV
projects.description: For my PFE, I co-developed a healthcare web app for online appointment booking. Our solution featured doctor scheduling and patient registration.

projects.title: MY_Calculator
projects.description: A simple calculator with basic functions that I created.
